医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
维生素 D 补充剂可降低 60 岁以上人群心脏病发作的风险《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项临床试验发现，维生素 D 补充剂可以降低 60 岁以上人群发生心脏病等重大心血管事件的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Vitamin-D-supplements-may-reduce-risk-of-heart-attacks-in-people-over-60.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Vitamin-D-supplements-may-reduce-risk-of-heart-attacks-in-people-over-60.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01948f4a-7681-47d6-b1b6-ca2cb19a7611 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 10:02:00 -0400 Vitamin D supplements may reduce risk of heart attacks in people over 60
咖啡因被发现对治疗出生窒息最有效出生时缺氧引起的脑损伤是全世界新生儿死亡的主要原因之一。波恩大学医院 (UKB) 和 DZNE 的研究人员使用小动物模型测试了 25 种不同活性药物的治疗效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Caffeine-found-to-be-most- effective-for-treating-birth-asphyxia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Caffeine-found-to-be-most- effective-for-treating-birth-asphyxia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=780c25b0-805f-4f91-a257-38efbbe8164a Mon, 03 Jul 2023 09:52:02 -0400 Caffeine found to be most effective for treating birth asphyxia
更年期激素治疗与痴呆和阿尔茨海默病发病率增加有关《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项丹麦大型研究表明，使用更年期激素疗法与痴呆和阿尔茨海默病发病率增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Menopausal-hormone-therapy-linked-with-increased-rate-of-dementia-and-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Menopausal-hormone-therapy-linked-with-increased-rate-of-dementia-and-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a82f906c-5bf6-4148-bac4-20613085b915 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 09:29:24 -0400 Menopausal hormone therapy associated with increased rate of dementia and Alzheimer's disease
从转基因猪心脏移植中获得的见解研究人员描述了一名 57 岁男性患者的基因工程猪心脏异种移植手术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Insights-gained-from-genically-modified-pig-heart-transplantation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Insights-gained-from-genically-modified-pig-heart-transplantation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4e4234a-0b8a-4be5-91c4-c9dab6538c49 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 09:19:00 -0400 Insights gained from genetically modified pig heart transplantation
乳酸菌阴道栓剂可能有助于预防绝经后妇女复发性膀胱炎复发性膀胱炎（RC）是一种常见的尿路和膀胱感染，在绝经后女性中非常流行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Lactobacillus-vaginal-suppositories-may-help-prevent-recurrent-cystitis-in-postmenopausal-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Lactobacillus-vaginal-suppositories-may-help-prevent-recurrent-cystitis-in-postmenopausal-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84ccf087-42de-47ed-b1d7-1cb90fe89c11 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 08:44:00 -0400 Lactobacillus vaginal suppositories may help prevent recurrent cystitis in postmenopausal women
前沿研究：机器学习识别 1 型糖尿病的早期预测因子科学家利用血浆蛋白蛋白质组学来鉴定与 1 型糖尿病发病相关的蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Cutting-edge-research-machine-learning-identizes-early-predictors-of-type-1-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Cutting-edge-research-machine-learning-identizes-early-predictors-of-type-1-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99082e44-04c7-48e8-9fd5-0a7358dc242b Mon, 03 Jul 2023 08:27:00 -0400 Cutting-edge research: machine learning identifies early predictors of type 1 diabetes
随着 DNA 合成技术需求的增加，Camena Bioscience 完成 1000 万美元 A 轮融资Camena Bioscience 是一家为制药和生物技术行业提供基因的合成生物学公司。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Camena-Bioscience-closes-2410m-Series-A-financing-as-demand-for-DNA-synthesis-technology-increases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Camena-Bioscience-closes-2410m-Series-A-financing-as-demand-for-DNA-synthesis-technology-increases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bcfac374-84ec-4676-a0c2-ab742a4f3d24 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 08:06:00 -0400 Camena Bioscience closes $10m Series A financing as demand for DNA synthesis technology increases
